{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/title|deallocate}}
{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl|since=c++11| 
void deallocate( pointer p, size_type n ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Uses the outer allocator to deallocate the storage referenced by {{tt|p}}, by calling {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;OuterAlloc&gt;::deallocate(outer_allocator(), p, n)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|pointer to the previously allocated memory}}
{{par|n|the number of objects for which the memory was allocated}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===See also===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/allocator/dsc deallocate}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/allocator_traits/dsc deallocate}}
{{dsc end}}
